channel.title: Data Science on Gradon Nicholls
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Gradon Nicholls

item.title: How Influential Are Music Critics?
item.description: I gave this presentation on December 6, 2021 as part of the course SURV727 “Fundamentals of Cmputing and Data Display.” I use R for data collection, and then clean and analyze the data in Stata. My data science experience grew quickly and greatly during this course, and I had a lot of fun combing various sources of data involving API’s from Spotify, Last.FM, Wikipedia, and Google, and using web scraping techniques to obtain review scores from Wikipedia.
